name: Chess Move
description: Apply a move in UCI format to a given FEN and return the resulting position
author: Example

fen.description: Starting position in FEN notation (e.g., 'rnbqkbnr/pppppppp/8/8/8/8/PPPPPPPP/RNBQKBNR w KQkq - 0 1')

move_uci.description: Chess move in UCI format: source square + target square (e.g., 'e2e4', 'g1f3'). For promotion: add piece letter
